Text: ...Kuhhhh!
Ughh...!

Well, well, look who can speak. And here I thought
you were only capable of heavy breathing.
You apostate...!
A man of great faith no less. What a catch.
...Kuhhh...chhhh...

Is that breathing of yours...some form of fighting
technique?

A charm of sorts? A repetitive act of devotion to
your faith that suppresses fear and unleashes
your battle power?

I'll give you credit. It's definitely more straight-
forward than letting possession run rampant.

After all, I'm sure that calmness is essential for
your control of magic and ironclad defense.
Still—
Tsk!

The way you fight shows no understanding of a true
enemy.

You are absolutely and utterly inexperienced against
an opponent who can easily pierce your magic
defenses!
You arrogant little...!
I-Impossible!

And when you go on the offensive, your magic defenses
are at their weakest!

Once you figure that out, it doesn't take much to
beat these templars. One more to go.
...Kuhhh...chhhh...!
Mnhh...?!
Th-This is one tough...bastard!

I told you, Delta! You need to pierce their magic
defenses by focusing your magic at a single point!

I've got no time for any of your tricks! I'll use my
claws to tear them apart, plain and simple!
Kuhhh...chhhh...!
Gaaaahhh!!!
Y-You beast... Agh...!

It seems to be working...but then not really... Which
is it?

Her opponent is completely blocking her claws, but
oddly enough, she's making him stagger...

Maybe his magic power is protecting him against the
sharpness of her claws, but at the same time, they're
serving as a blunt weapon?!
What're you mumbling to yourself about?

If that's the case...we may still be able to pierce
the enemy's defenses if we play our cards right!
Delta! Take a deep breath and follow after me!
I'm in second position? Not a big fan—What is it?

Umm...let's see, in that case...I'm in zero position,
so that means you're first!

I'm in first position! Got it! Huh? But you're
punching first, right, Epsilon? Hmm?
Kuhhh...chhhh...!
...Take this!
It didn't work at all!
True, my attack didn't reach the templar's body—

But it fully pierced his magic defenses! Like cutting
a magic thread, it'll cause everything to unravel.
You're up next, Delta!

I've got no idea what's going on, but take this! 
Awooo!!!
Aa...gghhh...!

Hee-hee! He's split right down the middle!
Look how strong I am!

*sigh* Good grief! I've got to get Delta to learn how
to properly defeat these guys.

Lady Alpha...has already defeated two of them on her
own.

Meanwhile, it's taken the two of us just to beat
one... We've still got a long way to go.
Chhhh...kuhhh...!

Your breathing is slightly erratic. I can sense your
irrepressible fear of me.
So...you're the templars.

If you're willing to speak honestly, I could
alleviate your fears.
Out of the question...you apostate...!
My quarrel is not with the Goddess Beatrix.

Or do you templars believe you have the authority to
speak on behalf of the goddess?
...Kuhhhh!

A masterful move worthy of a cornered beast. But all
you managed to do was keep up with my shadow.
Ngh...gaahhh...!!!

I won't kill you immediately—not until I know more
about you and the organization you serve.
Epsilon! Restrain this paladin.
Understood.
What should I be doing?
You can stay right there.
Got it!
No! Don't you dare!
Epsilon, stand back!
Let there be light...!
Ack... Unbelievable!

Whoa! He's gone all gooey and sticky! Stinks worse
than burnt boar meat...

He chose death without hesitation. And the way they
silenced that Cult member—they're definitely thorough.

The templars...a powerful force for the Church...
They may prove a formidable foe for the Garden.

But Lady Alpha, it was a one-sided victory on your
part.
As it was for the two of you.
I wish...

It seems like a fortissimo tone also works. It could
serve us in the future, now that we know.
Huh? Do I have something on my face?

Heheh. You're fine. Let's search the corpses for any
clues.
...They called us apostates, huh?

Yes. There's no longer any doubt that a faction
exists within the Church with radical ideologies
and superior fighting skills.

(Hmm. This is turning into a pretty typical scenario. 
I feel like she's taken Beta's ideas and refined them.)

So Alpha, you intend to wage a secret war against
the servants of the goddess and place the Garden
in their line of fire.
Yes, I'm prepared for that.
I see... Tread carefully.

By the way, Cid, I heard you previously told Delta
about the "templar."
Huh? Huh? Tempura?

...Oh, yeah, I did mention them to her. I made a
point of reminding her to try new things instead
of eating meat all the time.
*gasp*

Just as I thought... You always see ahead of us.
I can't believe you knew all this time.
Um? Alpha?

No, Cid, you don't have to say anything. I understand
exactly what you mean.

As for Delta, I'll make sure that she isn't always
eating meat and that she learns to fight with the
sword.
Hm? Oh, right. Sounds good.

(...Well, Delta definitely should be eating more
vegetables.)

(But trying to teach her the sword again? Hmmm, good
luck with that.)
Shadow...

I can only imagine just how much profound wisdom you
have coursing behind that dazed expression.
